ygData.subject: need help to keep "Latrodectus Mactans" alive
ygData.msgSnippet: it took me quite some time, after asking Su, that i would like to post this email asking for help, to make my guild survive. one of the reasons this took me so
ygData.messageBody:
it took me quite some time, after asking Su, that i would like to
post this email asking for help, to make my guild survive.

one of the reasons this took me so long is, that may feelings about
EQ were - say - "disturbed" by some RL events and i am close to
quitting EQ if i don't have some fun, or find some interesting
activity within the game soon.

what i want to ask for is, that even if you don't play on Tarew Marr
(or should i say especially), some add an alt to my guild
"Latrodectus Mactans" (latin for "Black Widow"). this guild was
basically ment for alt chars, but it started to become the home for
me and some friends. and we always have been to a very low number of
chars (better say accounts) within the guild, because our mains are
with other guilds.

some of the RL events have been, that some friends quitted EQ or
moved to another server. the reason for this are, that half of the
guild founders are from europe (germany and switzerland) and the
other half are from the states.

currently if you look up the guild, you may see up to four (sometimes
five) people online: one char belongs to a RL coworker, and i can be
online with up to three chars (and sometimes my ex-leader of our
ex-guild is playing her lower level mage).

may main goal is to keep the guild alive as long as possible.

if some who join are interrested in an active guild (and we have some
more players), i could also stage raids at different levels.

the most important restriction for people who want to join this guild
is that the level of the char must be two (2) or greater.

to contact me, you have two options: in game (tell Biltilie, Delaney,
Urva, Udaena, Ldara, Zimboka, or Nadja) or write me an email
mailto:biltilie@...


thanks in advance

- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, level 56 female gnome magician
Urva Ceindrech, level 51 female dark-elf wizard
Delaney Arianwen, level 51 female high-elf cleric
Latrodectus Mactans - Tarew Marr
